body:
So you mean module that gets included into the form class? 👍 sold

I'm not a huge fan of helpers. They're global namespace and tend grow out of hand real quick.

I have used [draper](https://github.com/drapergem/draper) for decorators before which worked quite good - kind of as an alternative to helpers.
